website_summaries.verdict: This LED light gives you options, with a magnetic base and an adjustable, rubber-padded screw clamp.
pros: Light made of 12 bright LED bulbs
Magnetic base with adjustable screw clamp for non-metal surfaces or stainless steel
cons: Rain can leak into and ruin battery compartment
Consider using grill cover or removing after use

customer_reviews.title: Not weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I received this light. It was bright, attached to my grill nicely and looked good. After being on the grill 2 weeks, I tried to use it for the first time. Not working. Opened battery compartment. It was wet and the battery holder had started to rust returned it. This is NOT WEATHER RESISTANT. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann L. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Just what every grill master needs + bonus uses
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. Very bright and focused with both clamp and magnetic mounting options. The clamp has rubber pads so it doesn't damage anything you clamp it to. Powered by 3 AAA batteries in a water tight compartment and using LEDs so those batteries will last for a very long time. I previously had a similar item for years (batteries leaked and made a mess of it) and we used it not just for grilling but when the power went out, clamped it to the table to provide enough light to move around the house in the dark or to read to pass the time. This newer one seems even brighter. I plan to get much use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Grim

customer_reviews.title: Versatile LED Grill Light
customer_reviews.text: I use this light on a Weber Summit grill (never liked the grill handle lights) and a Rec Tec smoker. The light is nice and bright for my use. The magnetic base with the "clamp on" option makes it extremely versatile; as evidenced by the use on two different products. The "goose neck" is also a great feature that I find myself using quite a bit. Once I find a good location for the mount, it's easy to adjust the goose neck so that the lamp doesn't interfere with lid opening and closings. Very well constructed with solid material. Additionally, higher heat is not a concern for me when using this grill light.
customer_reviews.author: cope's stuff

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 years then “Lights Out”
customer_reviews.text: Had this light just under two years and it stopped working. I thought the batteries were dead but put fresh ones in and nothing. I cleaned the contacts billet still nothing. I expected more than 2 years! The LED light is probably the problem but have no idea how to change that out. Looks like it isn’t removable.
customer_reviews.author: Two Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have BBQ Light!!!
customer_reviews.text: Provides great light onto the grill and love that the light direction can be moved with the flexible cord. We aren't able to use the clamp portion because of our grill design so we use the two magnetic feet and they are STRONG! Exactly what we were hoping for! Definitely recommend. Price was great and arrived quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: JayCee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Battery compartment fills with water and rusts the inside and eventually stops working. This is the second one I bought and it happened both times. Amazon replaced it for me the first time after 5 months as a courtesy since it was outside of the return window. The second one lasted only 7 months and I just got Amazon to refund me for the item as it is clearly defective.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Light On!
customer_reviews.text: Well Designed, functional utility device. Nice amount of concentrated light. The design of the vise mount allows for the light to be attached in a host of different ways and to practically anything. Where the vise attaches to the surface there are rubberized footings to allow for a strong, secure mount as well as protecting the mounting surface. As a bonus the light sits nicely balanced on the bottom knobs that are also magnatized.
customer_reviews.author: Will-i-am

customer_reviews.title: Well received
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our friend to use as a BBQ light because he's always grilling in the dark juggling a handheld flashlight. So far he is impressed with the construction, quality, and brightness of this light. He's a picky builder / tool user guy, so this means a lot. It's still early days though, so if something turns out to be awful or fails catastrophically, I'll have to come back and revise my review. First impressions are great so far, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamahina

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it rained! The inside tube where the batteries go rusted and doesn’t work anymore. It’s an outside product and I would think it would hold up better in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product - Wrong Grill
customer_reviews.text: The light appears to be of nice quality. Heavy metal, well assembled. Unfortunately it won't fit on either of my two grills (Weber Summit and Weber Genesis II). No matter how I try to attach it, even in what appear to be awkward spots, it won't attach securely. And while it appears to be magnetized on the bottom, it is not attracted to the stainless steel grill table surfaces on either side.
customer_reviews.author: David Julian Martin

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy. Rusting in less than 30 days. NOT Weather Resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product. It is advertised as weather resistant and high quality. It is not! Return window has closed. Bought this one month ago. The stem is rusting badly from rain. The light is bright and the magnet is strong. The stem is flexible and it’s a great light except for the fact that it’s rusting and I have had it less than a month. Sorry I cannot recommend. Update on this light. Not only is it rusted but it now is 70 percent less bright. I’ll be throwing this away and finding a new grille light. It rusted in 30 days and didn’t even last one year in terms of the light itself.
customer_reviews.author: RedSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Light.  Horrible weatherproofing.
customer_reviews.text: Just logged on to process a return of the light. Went to throw some burgers on the BIG Green Egg and no light. Opened battery compartment and voila! Rusty battery water. Terrific light. Design was perfect for attaching to most any grill table/surface. However, WATERPROOF is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Grill Light on my Weber Genesis
customer_reviews.text: I've had this light for about 2 weeks now. Used it 3 times already. As advertised. Only change I would recommend would be to have the head of the light be bigger for a brighter and bigger illumination. I feel like 2 would be perfect. I don't plan on keeping this light outside but bringing it out when needed. The magnets seem to be strong and I have no complaints. Overall I would recommend this for anyone looking to grill at night in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: cayman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. If you are looking for a stylish bright light for your bbq grill. Just get this one without even thinking about anything else. This light has a character.....super bright not only adds touch to your expensive nice grill but it also serve the purpose of grilling meet at night. I simply love it. I can guarantee you u r not gonna get this quality at this orice at HD or at lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Fawad

customer_reviews.title: Not weatherproof!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this but unfortunately it didn’t last even 2 weeks. We live in Texas where the weather is all over the place. Just a few days of rain and this no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: JerraJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Blackstone Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for the late night griddling I do at home. Everything works great! I placed it on the side shelf of my Blackstone griddle using the magnet. I placed it on the farther end of the shelf so that it is away from the heat which I read can melt the light fixture. The only thing I would like to change about this light is a bigger light fixture with more led lights. The light is too concentrated to a single point. I would like it to be more spread out to illuminate the whole cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this on my grill for almost 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my grill for almost a year now. a great light for cooking at night. Unfortunately it is no longer working. It seems that water has entered the battery casing compartment somehow. must be a leak somewhere at the joint between the arm and the base. I don't cover my grill so honestly, I am not terribly disappointed. For the cost the unit was both functional and way better looking than most of the options out there. i will likely be getting another one. i will probably put a bead of silicone over the housing joint though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have designed LED products for years and while I was not impressed with the cluster of Discrete LEDs and their blueish-white light. Despite that, it is perfectly adequate for the application (and isnt that all a product designer needs to satisfy) It is bright and the flex neck is great, very useful. Weather resistance is unknown so i do not take chances. I use the magnetic base and not the clamp, so I can bring in after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Love these BBQ Grill Lights!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as gifts because I have one very similar to this item and love it.....not only for the grill but also as an emergency light in the house in the winter if we have power outages. Sits on a flat service, attaches to railings or grill either by vise grip or powerful magnets.....moveable neck......perfect! Delivery was speedy, but I have kept these units in the boxes they arrived in and have not used either as they are intended for gifts. GREAT pricing!
customer_reviews.author: teacher2

customer_reviews.title: The best grill light ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this awesome light for over a year. It has been outside the whole time. There is an overhang, but it doesn’t stop blowing rain. I live 3 blocks from the Gulf of Mexico. Salt air is rough on stuff. This light has stood the test of time. I have not replaced the batteries yet. We have accidentally left it on all night too. It is worth every penny. No more trying to grill with a flashlight!
customer_reviews.author: Terrijean

customer_reviews.title: Dark Night, Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: I have gone 7 years with very little light in my patio, especially during the winter months where it gets dark early. I bought this grill light to help me bbq and so far it's been excellent. It very solidly built and the magnet is very strong. It works great on top of my smoker. Unfortunately, my grill doesn't have a surface for the magnet, but the adjustable screw clamp makes it a perfect grilling companion! For this price, this light is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Laser

customer_reviews.title: Great night Light for BBQ/ outdoor cooking
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look, and versatility of this light! Love that you can clamp on or magnet to ferrous surface. Magnets are very strong unit seems very well built. Adjusts very easily so you can point the light where you want. I do wish it was a little brighter and I'm not sure how weather proof it is because I take mine inside when not in use. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rippinbass

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright and sturdy light with an adjustable neck. Strong magnet. Great for grilling at night. Worked great from september until February. Now it has a short, always so dim i can't tell its on. I have to play with it and move around and twist it so the light gets bright and hopefully it stays lit. Once i get it to stay lit it goes out when the wind blow a little. Bad investment for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great light. It is magnetic so it can be placed anywhere on the grill. Long neck helps in that aspect as well. The clamping mechanism offers another way to anchor it so I can see it being used for other jobs around the house too like working on plumbing in dark places (under sinks). This makes it so more versatile than a hood-mounted grill light. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DominicanGorilla

customer_reviews.title: NICE LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This light is solidly constructed. It has a dual magnetic base as well as a screw clamp. I thought the long flexible neck might be a problem but it stays where you aim it. The light is bright enough to see the entire dual burner grille I have. I am pleased with the light and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: my dad (the grill master) LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who absolutely loves to grill. I mean, I never buy burgers or steaks at restaurants because they never compare to my father's. He loves it so much that sends me pictures every time he uses it... which is every time he grills after dark... which is several times/week. Buy this for your grilling friends, boyfriends, dads, bro-in-laws - they'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McRee

customer_reviews.title: Nice add on, needs better grip.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Could be a little brighter. The connector to mount the light needs a better way to ensure it won’t move when secured. Perhaps rubber tips. I would also urge a second tiny light or button on the back since it is difficult to know if it is off when you step away and the light is only showing inside the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ganem III

customer_reviews.title: Not weather resistant - corroded after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these for years - snow, rain, bitter cold, etc. Not a problem. Loved the LED lighting and the ability to twist the neck into position. When we finally needed to buy another one we order this one. This lasted 3 months then died because it leaked and corroded. OF COURSE the return window had expired at 2 months, it died at 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: W. Milson

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Light
customer_reviews.text: We grill outdoors rain or shine, winter, spring, summer and fall. I purchased the grill light because we have been grilling later in the evenings and we LOVE it! We have deck lighting as well as a flood light however the grill light makes it so much better to see. We would purchase it again! In fact we are already discussing who we will gift one or two with one for a Birthday, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, gift or holiday. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling in the dark. Powerful magnet clamps right onto the grill tables.
customer_reviews.text: Bright, easy to move from place to place due to the strong magnet if you have steel surfaces (Napoleon grills do). The goose neck is long enough to shine right onto the cooking surface. I don't know if it is supposed to be waterproof but I have been leaving mine outside in the rain and it still works, no rust. Runs on batteries. Works great, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: THE BATTERY COMPARMENT RUSTED WITHIN A FEW MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: The battery compartment rusted even though I took the batteries out for the winter. I tried to reach the company through their website and "contact us" and received NO reply to my request for a new battery assembly. Thank goodness Amazon accepted the return and sent me a new Grill Light. The light works fine, I have no complaints about the light itself. It was the lack of a sealed battery compartment which allowed moisture to rust the assembly. I am NOT impressed with the company at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Guido

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile grill light
customer_reviews.text: Used the light for the first time and found the mounting bracket quite versatile. Magnet is strong enough to hold light in place and the bracket itself has a wide opening allowing it to easily fit over the side shelves of a weber gas grill. I am anxious to try it on a charcoal kettle grill. The long flexible arm is great. It allows you to be flexible in your mounting choices and stays in place. The only downside is that the light is not quite as bright as i would like.
customer_reviews.author: sjonesphil

customer_reviews.title: Weather resistant? Not so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to be used on my bbq, which is outdoor. I was very excited when I got it. The build quality seemed solid, and the magnet was strong. I expected a bbq light that claims to be weather resistant to handle rain. I was wrong! Water got into the light head, and there is no way to get it out. The assembly does not come apart, which is a design flaw. The screws are also rusty, which is disappointing considering the body seems to be aluminum. I am not one to post a review, but this is the only way for the company to hear how to improve there product. Disappointed for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Levick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my BBQ light over a week ago and so far it is excellent. I cookout almost daily, even during the winter months. The lack of light has always been an issue, and this lights solves that problem. It is very heavy, great solid magnet and the light is bright enough for me to see what is going on, nice long flexible neck. I know it is weather resistant, but I like it so much I bring it in with me whenever I am done with it so I can make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This rusts
customer_reviews.text: How do you produce a product, designed for outside, use that does not rust? This product and "weatherproof" should not be used in the same sentence. I got part of a season out of it and now it doesn't work because moisture got into the battery compartment. The light was under a bbq cover. Also, the bendable neck on it is rusted. On top of that, the light is not very bright. Waste of money in my opinion. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cooking in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: This light is great! Magnetic base is plenty strong enough to stick to my Weber performer table and the clamp portion is great for clamping it to a table, railing etc. making it super adaptable! I was a little skeptical at first because it didn't seem that bright in the daylight but once it got dark it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I've always needed for grilling at night. I never have enough light at the grill and this works beautifully. The only thing I wish, and would have given 5 stars, is I wish the light was a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: BluznviceTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: BBQ LED Light built well
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light with a large capacity clamp and this one fit the bill. My grill is stainless steel and aluminum making the magnets useless but the clamp is great. The light is very bright and the goose neck is a good length since I have to clamp it on the end of the grill handle. Other commenters have stated there is a problem with moister corroding the battery contacts so I bring mine in after each use. So far no problems! Seems like a quality product for the price! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K

customer_reviews.title: VERY powerful light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for father's day for my boyfriend. He loves grilling in warmer months and in the fall even when it starts getting darker out. He was always having issues seeing inside the grill and needing to use his phone flashlight propped somewhere on the grill so I thought this would be a great purchase and it was. There is a powerful magnet on the bottom so you can prop it anywhere on the grill and the neck moves so you can point the light wherever you want it. The light is SUPER bright and lights up the whole back patio! It was a great purchase for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Paul

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical about magnet
customer_reviews.text: I figured I'd end up having to clamp this light to my grill, but the magnets are ridiculously strong and so the lamp can sit on a side table and I don't have to worry about it falling over. As for the light itself, it easily lights up the entire grilling surface making it easy to see food when it's completely dark out. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Find something better for your money
customer_reviews.text: This light cannot stay on the grill hood, the weight of the product itself pulls it off. It does stay securely in the the metal side leafs. The light should really be much brighter for a led. Wouldn’t buy again for this price! Should be much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Bought two...  Bought two more...
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable neck, bright light, good clamp, and strong magnet make this lamp ideal for ordinary household use such as outdoor washer dryer areas, BBQ grills, and even computer desks. Plus it's portable for emergencies like power outages and automotive repair. Just think of its many uses if you're into camping or... Come on !!! Use your imagination people !!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Wire

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this light!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is the 2nd time I bought this light, as I felt like the first time it was my fault that it didn't last. This time, I only took it outside when I needed to grill at night. All other times - it was in a nice dry garage. Well, only after a few months - this 2nd one has failed me too :( Now when I replaced the batteries, only the 4 LEDs in the middle light up. All of the LEDs on the perimeter are shot!! Sad that I spent this much $$$ 2X (TWICE) with the light failing both times!!
customer_reviews.author: Fish Finder

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Strong magnets, well built and durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived very quickly and packaged very well. We do a lot of grilling at my hose, and at night time as well so needed a light to help brighten up BBQ. This light is very well built and looks like it will hold up well over time. The magnets on the base are very , very strong. The LED lights are very bright and clear and its more of a bright white color which helps with clarity. So far its been working great!!
customer_reviews.author: Schpeen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outdoor/BBQ light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent outdoor/BBQ light. I'm not normally a fan of LED type lights, but the LED Concepts Grill light is perfect for evening grilling. It is sturdy and the neck can be twisted and move to provide good lighting without being in the way. This is my second LED Concepts light. I gave the first one away with my old grill, and this one was the first accessory I ordered for the new grill. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CaptBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Sheds plenty of light on the grilling subject
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s weather proof because the grill is pushed inside after every use but it is nice and bright and I like the flexibility to custom fit it to any grill or need. Has helped a lot with visibility at night grilling so no more over cooked steaks! To me that’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Durable, bright, and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now. This thing is durable, bright, and useful. The long gooseneck works great for adjusting the light to just the right position. The magnets are strong enough to hold the thing in any position I put it in. Originally I hesitated getting a battery powered light because I didn't think it could be bright enough, but this thing surpasses my expectations! This is definitely money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kaveman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light with great hopes, but the batteries that came in the light were all corroded when I went to replace them, not even 2 months old. I installed new batteries and the light is barely visible. I checked the batteries and they are new with full charge.
customer_reviews.author: SLATER

customer_reviews.title: Great function overall
customer_reviews.text: Great light, works as advertised. Strong magnets hold firmly in place. I would pay a little more for an even brighter light, with more overall coverage. the flashlight effect points light in a specific direction, but i'd like to see all my steaks at once and not have to point the light around.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Light
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. She raved so much that I purchased one for my son and his reply was the same. Both were very enthusiastic about it. The other evening my daughter and I wanted to play Backgammon outside. It was dark so she got the Grill Light and clamped it on the table. It worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: More than enough light for my grill 22” grill. Strong magnets for versatility in placement. The light also doesn’t attract flying insects, or at least hasn’t thus far. I can’t comment on how weatherproof it is, as I use it under a sheltered patio. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not waterproof! I had it on my grill that I keep covered and under my porch when I’m not using it and it looks like condensation got in the light.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Replacing one I had for years
customer_reviews.text: I had a grill light almost exactly the same as this one for about a decade. I loved that light. I left it out, in the storage area of my grill, all year. It was dry there, but subject to summer heat and winter freezing in Boston. It worked flawlessly until the on/off switch finally went. I ordered this as a replacement and the only difference I can see is that it has more LED lights and is therefore brighter than the one it is replacing. I grill all year long and especially need a light when the sun sets circa 5pm in the winter. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: BostonBob

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grilling husband. Told me it was the best gift he ever got. Loves how easy it is to remove and take inside. He loves to keep this nice, so he loves removing after every use and keeping it out of the elements. I dont think it gives out a great deal of light but the griller says its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Liked this light very much when I bought and first ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked this light very much when I bought and first started using it. However, after a rainy night, stopped working. Opened up the battery compartment and found it full of water. Had used the magnet to hold it on a horizontal surface of my grill, so it is exposed. Wouldn't expect to have this problem with a product designed to be used with an outdoor grill. Fortunately, after letting the light dry in the garage and putting in new batteries, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Whoever reviewed this thing 5 stars just bought it. Trust me. After about 3 months it started losing its ability to hold itself. It’s now been 8 months and it needs viagra. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as the description says, super bright and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We needed a light for our four foot deep pizza oven that was bright enough to see all the way in the back, but one that didn't get in the way. This light works great for both tasks. The light is bright enough to clearly see all the way to the back of the oven and the flexible neck makes it easy to angle the light so that only the light head is by the oven opening.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for installing. Can mount with the vise or use the magnets. Light is bright and with the long neck you can adjust to light up any area. Says it is weather resistant not water proof so I’ll find out how much soon. But so far the best grill light I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I'm really satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I had to admit i was some kind of exceptical to the quality and functional of this unit. And definetlly i must admit i was wrong. The brightest of the led lamp it awesome with good ratio of ilumination, the bottom magnet which is really strong give you the versability to install what ever you want right on the top of grill or in one of side in stand position.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great High Quality Light
customer_reviews.text: Not much to add from the previous reviews. This casts a nice wide beam that hits all of the cooking surface and makes it easy to work during the dark The magnets are super powerful and to me a much better alternative than the clamps. I will likely buy another one as this a great piece of equipment that turns out to be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: GalvezGuy

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it works, but flaky, and now kaput
customer_reviews.text: I noticed some reviews said that the light would occasionally drop out but if you tapped the holder it would come back on again. Sure enough that happened. But now it's largely kaput after about two years. If I press on the light, it will come back on, but as soon as I release the pressure it goes dark. Nothing lasts forever, I suppose, but there was a flaw in the design from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Henwood

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than 2 years, which is longer than many customers have cited. Changing the batteries made no difference. There is no obvious way to contact the manufacturer. If you are looking for a durable light, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetieroo

customer_reviews.title: Night Grilling Savior
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a life saver since daylight savings time went bye-bye, and I find myself grilling in the dark more often than not. I've left it out in the rain a few times (my mistake) and it still works like a champ. The neck is flexible, but then stays in place where you need it. The magnets are quite strong, and I have not had any issues securing it. I have not yet had to use the clamp feature.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Badlwin

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: This barbecue light works much better than the plastic "LightPlus Ultrabright LED Indoor/Outdoor Light," which broke into pieces this year. I contacted that company's owner, and never heard a response.
customer_reviews.author: But It's a Dry Rain

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Strong magnet. Good grip to anchor with the vice screw provided . The arm bends in every direction . Bought one 8 years ago and purchased another .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable light
customer_reviews.text: Great little light Weber grill light broke This little light has been amazing. Able to adjust close down works great !!! Much cheaper than trying to replace the Weber light
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good light, strong magnetic base, long goose neck.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, nice brightness. Strong magnetic base. Good clamp. Not sure "weather resistant" it is, but I won't be leaving out all the time. Will be purchasing another for my camp kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment leaks
customer_reviews.text: The function and brightness seemed good, but as others have stated, the battery compartment leaks and corrodes badly. I wasn't impressed when opening it and black water/battery acid dripped all over my hand... it is now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: rguy2

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong multi purpose light....
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a fairly heavy duty grill (all purpose) LED light. Workmanship seems to be quite good, despite the reasonable price. My grill side table is metal, so I have the perfect place for it. And since my UDS is taller than the table, the long neck certainly comes in handy. A great buy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: unklgreg

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of light, easy,  updated... to adjust, very stable
customer_reviews.text: The light works very well, the first one i had lasted a decent amount of time outside all the time. Revised review for this item - only lasted a month. Battery compartment is all wet and corroded....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Demersky

customer_reviews.title: Great light with strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I barbeque year round and when the clocks change in the winter it is tough to keep a track on how things are cooking. This BBQ light has a sturdy magnetic base that can also be used as a clamp to keep your light in place. The magnets are good and strong so no need for me to use the clamp. It throws a good light across my barbeque allowing me to grill with confidence. A great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: hdavid1792

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave it outside
customer_reviews.text: Keep this thing dry because if it gets wet at all, it will completely rust and cease to function. It is not weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon G. Milne

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERSATILE FOR DIRECTING LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Gooseneck is long enough to direct the light to the area you want. Magnets are very strong for holding it in place. I would definitely buy this again. Not sure how weatherproof it is.
customer_reviews.author: bodocthehawk

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged. Obviously not from shipping. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. Obviously not from shipping. I can't even close the item box bc the it is shoved in it so that it doesn't even fit. I assume it was a return. I can't even gift it now bc of the condition.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Not to be left outside!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home in Florida and obviously should not be left outside even if protected. After just a few weeks of use,(actually only used a couple of times) the batteries corroded and can no longer use. Either that or it was defective. Too late to get a refund. Quite disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mauch

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me 7 months. One summer. One NC winter on a screened in porch and the LED unit has a intermittent connection and does not light. Just grin bbq? Don't know. I was careful. Otherwise real nicely made. I will try another. I tried three more. They all crapped out. I found a pair of led magnet bottom lights in an otter type box that work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken E

customer_reviews.title: works any where
customer_reviews.text: I attached this to my recumbant bike so I could see the screen and it works great! Due to the spot I needed to put it I held it on with velcro straps. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DawnRobin O'

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and well made
customer_reviews.text: I originally planned to attach the grill light magnetically to the metal hinge assembly on the back of my Kamado Joe grill. However, I found that the light placement worked better by attaching it to the side table using the vice grip. The flexible neck allows the light to be pointed in any direction. The light is very easy to attach and remove. The quality is very good for the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L.

customer_reviews.title: worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for an outdoor grill. It lasted for about 8 months before the batteries corroded and the whole thing quit working.
customer_reviews.author: janese carrigan

customer_reviews.title: ... came on time and after inserting batteries it worked fine. Would have given this 5 stars but at ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and after inserting batteries it worked fine. Would have given this 5 stars but at this time we're using the magnetic hold as we can't seem to unscrew the clamp to adjust to our grill which we would prefer. Light is bright and it adjusts to any position needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dina C

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and bright
customer_reviews.text: Excellent BBQ light.....must use new premium batteries for best results. Really throws lots of bright light w/good batteries, and lasts many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness Guy Jr

customer_reviews.title: An identical replacement for my 12 year old unit.
customer_reviews.text: After 12 years, my old, identical light, failed. While I do cover my grill, I leave this light out for use at any time. It is well made, very sturdy, with a strong magnetic base. I do like the style.
customer_reviews.author: AHD

customer_reviews.title: Every Part Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 5. The light is very bright, the magnet is incredible, the bendy neck makes it very convenient. I will say i have a very large grill and I am going to purchase a second one so I can light both sides of the grill at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: RAN

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my smoker egg. Was just as advertised. I can clamp it on my cart or on the handle of the egg. The light is perfect and flexibility is very useful. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CALIN8V

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great little light. We use it for cooking, dining, playing cards. Attaches to most surfaces and directs lighting where you want it. Good quality; good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ssass

customer_reviews.title: Bright and versatile
customer_reviews.text: My Weber grill has a light built but this powerful light adds the right amount of additional light I needed. The fact that it is magnetic and can be used at any angle on the grill plus the flexible neck is a huge bonus. A+ on versatility of use!
customer_reviews.author: Daisydoots

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: These are not weather resistant! I've purchased two of them. The inside battery holder will corrode and is very flimsy. I called the company to ask if I could purchase a replacement part...and they told me they would not, do not. If you intend to leave outside...they won't last long. Find a different light.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ruffner

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light for the grill! The material feels very heavy duty and attaches in seconds. We like to keep our patio light on a dimmer setting so this worked perfectly for added light. Light bends in every direction and works great for my char griller. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mason W

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: Excellence in versatility Don't forget, magnets do not stick to stainless grills. You'll have to use the clamp but it's no big deal
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is a gooood light to have TRY IT
customer_reviews.text: This is a ALL purpose light it's for your BAR B Q GRILL but you can use it for most anything I use it to help me work on my pickup trucks
customer_reviews.author: Sammy R.

customer_reviews.title: Provides excellent light for your grill
customer_reviews.text: We have a Traeger grill that we keep on an area of our deck that does not get direct light at night. This grill light fastens very securely to the top of our pellet hopper & provides great light with the touch of a button. We're very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GolfDude

customer_reviews.title: The lights attach easily to the bbq
customer_reviews.text: The lights attach easily to the bbq, be it magnetically or clamping. We've not had a chance to try the lights in the dark, what with the changing into daylight savings time, we have been able to bbq while light is still available. But just playing around with them it was good illumination on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a Big Green Egg and this lovely got works perfectly. It’s also handy to more around from smoker to cutting table. The light is very bright but at the same time made to focus on the exact spot you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OUTDOOR USE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT A SECOND ONE OF THESE LIGHTS FIGURING IT WAS A TOUGH WINTER... LAST YEAR AND THE LIGHT JUST COULD NOT TAKE IT. WELL MY SECOND ONE ONLY LASTED 60 DAYS. I LIVE IN BOSTON AND OUR THE WEATHER IS NOT EXTREME HERE AT ALL. THESE LIGHTS ARE TERRIBLE QUALITY AND NOT FOR OUTDOOR USE. WASTED MY MONEY TWICE FOOLISHLY!!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Ricciardi

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp does not shed a lot of light and it is by no means rain and weather-proof. I have to change the batteries everytime it rains and now the battery holder to rusty and unusable. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SRK

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust the goose-neck, and nice and bright at night. We take it in when rain is forecast, but it's still gotten damp, and that hasn't affected it at all.
customer_reviews.author: JLo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and works very well grilling on winter nights. I have received a number of similar questions so here's my answer again. Do NOT leave on grill when not in use. It is not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Giles

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, good hold
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright and the magnets are very strong. I haven't had it long enough to really evaluate the battery life, but I am very pleased with this item so far. The gooseneck on the light is flexible but stays where you put it so it's great for setting just the way you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Filko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, reasonably bright, strong magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably bright for using 3 AAA batteries. The magnet is quite strong, and holds it well. I keep accidentally unscrewing the battery compartment rather than the clamp screw, which is mainly my fault. I do wish it used larger batteries than AAA's though.
customer_reviews.author: Genthar

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box the light was flikering
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the light was flickering. Its still flickering as of today and I have to keep tightening the bolts. Not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Juice40

product_meta.title: LED Concepts BBQ Grill Lights Magnetic Base Super-Bright LED Lights-360 Degree Flexible Gooseneck, Weather Resistant, Task Lighting Barbecue Grilling, Works (1 Pack)
feature_bullets: GRILLING & BBQ LIGHT – Perfect for outdoor grilling and BBQ – Provides instant illumination exactly where you need it
MULTI-FLEX NECK – 22 Inch Goose-neck that adjusts 360° to illuminate any task
ADJUSTABLE SCREW CLAMP – Sturdy adjustable clamp that attaches to various surfaces to ensure that the weight of the extendable light won’t topple over
MAGNETIC BASE – Attaches and holds to most metal surfaces – Cordless task light made of weather-resistant aluminum construction
LED LIGHT TECHNOLOGY – 12 LED energy efficient lighting that lasts longer than regular light bulbs – Provides even illumination – Uses 3 AAA batteries (NOT INCLUDED)
